structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The authority is authorized to defray the cost of acquiring any real or personal property for the purposes contemplated in KRS 65.510 to 65.650 through the issuance of revenue bonds, and for that purpose the authority shall have all the powers and duties that are granted to or imposed upon governmental units by law.
law.history: Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 8. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 6.
